summary.Title: Ukrainian consultant/ Interpreter - Ukrainsk konsulent/tolk
summary.Presentation: Ukrainian consultant/ Interpreter to Children and Young people at Skanderborg municipalitySkanderborg municipality are looking for a Ukrainian employee who can act as a consultant /

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Ukrainian consultant/ Interpreter to Children and Young people at Skanderborg municipality

Skanderborg municipality are looking for a Ukrainian employee who can act as a consultant / Interpreter in connection with childcare in the nursery and kindergarten and teaching offers in the school for Ukrainian refuges with a basis for residence.

About the position
As a Consultant / Interpreter you must act as a Consultant / Interpreter in connection with the establishment and operation of a separate school offer and daycare for Ukrainian refugees. You will work with Danish early childhood educators and teachers at a permanent address.

Your qualifications
As a Consultant /Interpreter you must;
  • interpret to/from Ukrainian/English or to/from Ukrainian/Danish
  • must be a trained teacher or pedagogue
  • preferably with experience from school management, management of nursery and/or kindergarten and/or pedagogy consultant from Ukraine
  • You must have a residence permit in Denmark either as a permanent resident or with a residence in accordance with the ‘new special law’

Salary and conditions of employment
Employment will be a task-related appointment.
The employment is full time: i.e. 37 hours per week. Part-time employment can be negotiated. Start-up as soon as possible
Salary will be in accordance with the Danish collective agreements in this line of work.

We will be conducting job interviews on an ongoing basis.

If you wish to apply for the position, please write a short motivation for your application, a description of your education and experience and enclose your CV. Attach your diploma if possible.

To apply for the position – press “Søg stillingen”

If you want to know more
For further information, please email Mogens Sønderby via mobile 22 39 34 12 or email mogens.sonderby.nielsen@skanderborg.dk

About Children and Young People
Children & Young People deals with persons in the municipality between the ages of 0 and 18. This includes everything from schools, day care, PPR and health care to SSP (cooperation between social services, school and the police) and special and social counselling. The task of Children and Young People is to support each family’s efforts to create a good life for their children, in which children and young people thrive and develop in a safe environment. This is all part of the political vision that all children have the right to a good childhood, experiencing of joy, security, commitment, enthusiasm and resilience in order to meet life’s challenges.

Ukrainsk konsulent/tolk til børn og ungeområdet i Skanderborg kommune
Skanderborg Kommune søger en ukrainsk medarbejder, som kan fungere som konsulent/tolk i forbindelse med pasningstilbud i vuggestue og børnehave og undervisningstilbud i skolen til ukrainske flygtninge med opholdsgrundlag.

Om stillingen
Som konsulent/tolk skal du fungere som konsulent/tolk i forbindelse med etablering og drift af en særskilt skole og dagtilbud for ukrainske flygtninge. Du vil komme til at arbejde sammen med danske pædagoger og lærere på en fast lokation i Skanderborg Kommune.

Dine kompetencer
Som konsulent/tolk skal du;
  • kunne tolke ukrainsk/engelsk eller ukrainsk/dansk
  • være uddannet lærer eller pædagog
  • gerne have erfaring med skoleledelse, ledelse af vuggestue og børnehave og/eller pædagogisk konsulent fra Ukraine
  • have opholdstilladelse i Danmark enten som fastboende eller med ophold efter ”den nye særlov”.

Løn og ansættelsesforhold
Ansættelsen vil foregå som en opgave relateret ansættelse. Ansættelsen er i udgangspunktet fuldtid med 37 timer ugentligt. Der kan dog forhandles om deltidsansættelse. Opstart hurtigst muligt. Løn i overensstemmelse med de danske overenskomster på området.

Ansættelsessamtaler foretages løbende.

Ønsker du at søge stillingen, bedes du skrive en kort motivation for din ansøgning, en beskrivelse af din uddannelse og erfaring samt medsende dit CV. Vedhæft om muligt dit uddannelsesbevis.

Hvis du vil vide mere
For yderligere spørgsmål til stillingen kan der rettes henvendelse til Mogens Sønderby via mobil 22 39 34 12 eller på mail mogens.sonderby.nielsen@skanderborg.dk.

Om Børn og Unge
Børn & Unge beskæftiger sig med kommunens borgere mellem 0 og 18 år. Dette dækker over alt fra skoler, dagtilbud, PPR, og sundhedstjeneste til SSP og special- og socialrådgivning. Børn og Unges opgave er, at understøtte den enkelte families bestræbelse på at skabe det gode børneliv, hvor børn og unge trives og udvikles i trygge rammer. Dette sker alt sammen under den politiske vision, at alle børn har ret til et godt børneliv, hvor de har oplevelsen af glæde, tryghed, engagement, begejstring og robusthed i forhold til livets udfordringer.
